timeline.bodyText: Super small nitpick, but a description should end in a period, to keep consistent with other descriptions

timeline.bodyText: Patterns should be on their own lines. Also, shouldn't it be livingentities? I don't know if that actually matters though.

timeline.bodyText: We usually don't include annotations like this. It should be okay for the warning to be there.
